content: Back outside, continue on the main path taking out the three lesser wolves and harvesting Jade Lotus from the pond and Gentian on to the right of the path.

Back outside, continue on the main path taking out the three lesser wolves and harvesting Jade Lotus from the pond and Gentian on to the right of the path.
